page.title: 13BRENTWOOD PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
The most popular games amongst the 7-8 year old boys was{Football.}The teams consist of 7 people and each team has to kick a ball into a goal against the other team. Another game was{Cat and Mouse}with one team as mouse and the other as cat. The cat must chase and catch the mouse and when caught vice versa.
Among the 9-10 year olds{Football} was again very popular with the boys and for the girls{Sticky Toffee}in which one player is 'up' and has to chase the others. The 11 year old boys played{Football}and{Marbles.}The girls played{Sticky Toffee}and{Off Ground {Touch.}One player chases the rest and the others have to run away keeping off the ground as much as possible. They can only be caught on the ground.
